Description:
The Size Home, Allotment, Shedding & Surrounds You Desire
This home is sure to cause a stir. The large family dwelling has great room proportions with the fourth bedroom being an optional formal dining or studio. There is a vast open plan kitchen, meals and lounge. The home is set back from the street for privacy and yet still offers a huge amount of yard space for games, pets and gardens, while hosting great shedding. The 1859m2 block has two oversized garages with workshop space and a tandem carport adjoining the residence. The abode overlooks bushland, while being just a three minute drive back into the hub of town for shopping or your favorite coffee. Entertainers will also appreciate the large outdoor area for your guests.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Description:
"Willowbank" A beautiful rural Homestead located in the Daylesford region via Blampied, on 130 acres.
This property consists of a 1910 homestead incorporating two enormous bedrooms, modern bathroom, expansive living and dining room and stunning kitchen. In addition to this is an airy redecorated one-bedroom 1870’s cottage with open plan living, kitchen and bedroom, ideal for guests or B&B accommodation. Outbuildings include a separate study (formally an old historic stone dairy store) and a laundry and games room in the old dairy.
With lush fenced paddocks ideal for cattle, sheep and equine enjoyment, horse training ring, abundant exotic fruit trees, and an explosion of horticultural colour, vegetable varieties and successful truffle plantation. All this complemented with a tranquil solar heated infinity wall pool, spa and tennis court. Also featuring vast creek frontage, a large and two smaller dams, ample rainwater storage tanks and farm equipment and hay shedding.
This beautiful property is only 15 minutes from Daylesford/Hepburn Springs and 20 minutes from Creswick, and a short drive to the unique Swiss Mount Hotel.

Description:
Peaceful Creswick location on 1/4 acre - dual access
Great options for retirees, investors or developers in this quiet yet central Creswick location- with two-street frontage, a lovely 1/4 acre block with amazing gardens and no less than 9 varieties of fruit trees, this superb property is ideally suited to many. Nestled proudly in a commanding position, this lovely home features 2 enormous bedrooms, 2 very large living areas, an inviting shady verandah overlooking the private gardens, a 7.5x4m garage built as a studio, and is within walking distance to the town centre. Polished hardwood flooring, 2 gas heaters, gas hot water, F/F elec stove and town and tank water. Easy access to all Creswick facilities, the 2 street frontage should enable easy potential subdivision (stca) if desired, and the immaculate presentation means there is nothing to be done but move in and enjoy.

Description:
Aghadoe Estate - Circa 1860
Aghadoe Estate is nestled on approx 52.3 acres. The original homestead has been tastefully renovated to retain all its historical charm whilst providing for all modern day living and comforts. The homestead includes a fabulous gourmet kitchen, 5 bedrooms, 3 luxurious bathrooms, 2 living zones, ducted heating and cooling, open fireplaces (jetmaster and coonara), slab heating to kitchen/dining area, monitored alarm system and a partially converted barn that is ideal for guest accommodation or other business pursuits (STCA). To complete this beautifully restored estate the homestead is encased amongst mature and majestic gardens, trees and lawns with picturesque rural views. Ideal for a weekend retreat, family home or a continuation of the current owner’s successful guest accommodation and wedding venue business.
Outside this property includes:
• converted stables
• established gardens
• veggie patch with greenhouse and potting shed
• majestic fir trees and extensive lawn areas
• abundant mature fruit trees and tree lined driveway
• Chook pen
• 6 fenced paddocks with electric fencing and stock troughs for water, cattle yards and crush
• town water, spring fed dam with irrigation to the extensive and established gardens
• 3 x 25,000 litre water tanks.
• 3 bay lock up garage
Approx. 20kms from both Daylesford and Ballarat.
Inspections as advertised online and by private appointment by request

Description:
Quality Family Home in Beautiful Tranquil Setting
This beautifully refurbished home is positioned to perfection on a gorgeous half acre allotment the home features 4 bedrooms plus a study, 3 separate living zones with updated kitchen and bathroom. Hardy plank in construction this beautiful home has all the creature comforts incorporating wood combustion fire, reverse cycle cooling, new appliances including wall oven, ceramic hot plates and dishwasher. There's a real emphasis on family living with large windows and sliding doors leading out onto wonderful wrap around decked area overlooking the stunning bush block surrounds with wonderful birdlife and regular visits from our wildlife including kangaroos, koala's and even a resident echidna. Outside features lock up garage, double carport and additional shed / workshop, ideal for the home handyman. Situated just 5 minutes from the Creswick town centre and 20 minutes from the Ballarat CBD this fringe property is positioned to perfection and a real retreat for those looking for peace and tranquillity yet coupled together with modern day conveniences one has come to expect. A real surprise package from front to back, inside and out this home won't last, so call now to book your private viewing today.

Description:
Sweet 10 Acres Property On Outskirt Of Town
This delightful property has the views, the space and the lifestyle you are looking for. The private 10 acre dwelling has wondrous 360 degree views. Who doesn't enjoy a long driveway with trees creating a picturesque avenue. The home itself is a young two bedroom abode with a spacious open plan kitchen, meals and lounge. There are three large paddocks and one smaller for your horses, ponies, alpaca, etc. Good shedding is provided with room for more. Just 3 minutes back into the hub of town, it offers the best of both worlds. Serene yet convenient. Currently tenanted, there is the option of securing the home with vacant possession, while the tenant is happy to stay on and continue to bring a return.

Description:
'Glenburnie' Circa 1800's
Presenting a rare opportunity to secure acreage in this tightly held region just a short drive from Ballarat and easy commute to Melbourne. Originally built in the 1800s, the grand residence has had many updates over that time and recently another extensive renovation to the majority of the home. Boasting brand new country kitchen with Belling oven and cooktop, and a combination of beautiful timber and stone benchtops. The three separate living areas provide space for the largest of families and with 5 bedrooms and a study everyone will have their own escape. One of the main features has to be the completely transformed master bedroom with luxurious ensuite and spacious walk-in-robe. All seasons are covered by gas ducted heating, three fireplaces and evaporative cooling throughout. Outside the home is surrounded by easy care established gardens with a large chestnut orchard. The approx. 81 acres of productive land is fenced into three main paddocks and serviced by 2 dams. Both the Beckworth and Glendaruel creeks pass through the property. A bore provides good quality water, in addition to two 23,000 litre rainwater tanks. An open bay machinery shed along with workshop, old shearing shed, dairy and cattle yards. To cap it all off, not only do you have complete privacy but also astounding views over the rolling countryside and Mt Beckworth and Mt Bolton. An opportunity not to be missed. Be sure to book your inspection today.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Address: 15 St Georges Lake Road Creswick VIC 3363
Description:
An idyllic home in the country!
Boasting a peaceful and private location – walking distance to both the township and St Georges Lake this character filled Miners Cottage may be your perfect home in the country. With approx. 1 acre of land and direct access to the adjoining State Forest, the home is surrounded by established trees and gardens along with a fenced paddock for an animal or two! The home comprises 2 bedrooms, an updated bathroom, lounge, country kitchen (with dishwasher and double Italian stove), sunroom and a dining room that has potential as a third bedroom option. A single garage and workshop is located next to the home. With picture perfect views via windows and French Doors the rambling style garden offers numerous private outdoor entertaining areas. Features of note include a split system AC unit, combustion wood-heater, instantaneous gas hot water, mains water, shelter for animals, established old Miravella plums trees, apples trees, architectural liquid amber trees, fish pond and a vegetable garden. With easy access to Ballarat (15 mins), Clunes (15 mins) and Daylesford (20 mins), there is also easy access to Melbourne via the Western Hwy.

Description:
Country Lifestyle just 15 minutes to Daylesford and 10 minutes to Creswick
Located in the quiet hamlet of Newlyn, on just under 2.5acres consisting of three crown allotments, this charming country property provides many lifestyle options with its warm relaxed feel, perfect for the country weekender or new home.
Comprising two good size bedrooms both with BIRs, living room and renovated bathroom with separate bath. A new kitchen is warmed by an Esse wood fired stove which can also heat your hot water.
Good fencing, ample shedding, raised vegetable garden beds, fruit trees and an established country style garden.
The property has recently been reroofed, rewired, has a well and is connected
to town power and water.
Call today to arrange for a private inspection.

Description:
2428m2 (0.60 Acres) Restful Location Offering Space & Comfort Inside & Out
Situated between Ballarat and only minutes from the ever popular tourist destination of Daylesford, this spacious family home is sited on a huge 0.60 acre allotment amid established gardens and is assured to offer something to please everyone in the family. The well laid out floorplan accommodates four double bedrooms all with BIR's (Ensuite and WIR to main) and two separate living zones. A modern well-appointed kitchen has stainless appliances with and adjoining light filled meals area which naturally flowing to a deck perfect for entertaining. Separate living areas ensure room for the growing family and there is a study with NBN connected. Year round comfort is assured with a choice of slow combustion wood heating and split system. For those in need of space for the boat and caravan this property is also a must see with front and rear access to a 15m x 7.5m shed with concrete floor, mains power and a mechanics pit. A complete and comprehensive offering in a well-regarded and convenient location that is assured to please.

Description:
WHAT COULD YOU DO HERE
Cottage on BIG 1229m2 block (20 metres x 60 metres approx). Creswick a magnificent country existence awaits, a beautiful example of our Gold mining era with historic towns close by including Clunes, Daylesford and Talbot. Easy access to the city of Ballarat, Rail and Freeway to Melbourne. This old time cottage is located to the front leaving ample side & a huge backyard. The property has two road frontages.
The cottage has a verandah at front, central hallway, 2 bedrooms and separate lounge with servery to kitchen plus wood heating.
Currently leased on a periodic tenancy of $225 per week.
A TRUE BLUE BACKYARD – Great opportunity
Terms 10% deposit
Balance – 60 days or as agreed

Description:
A SUNNY COUNTRY LIFESTYLE
Located in Newlyn just 15 minutes from Daylesford, 5 minutes to Creswick and 20 minutes to Ballarat.
Adjoining and overlooking farmland with panoramic views to the distant hills, this charming and immaculately presented 1940’s era home with living areas bathed in natural light has been beautifully restored and modernised to provide relaxed living. Sited on a large block of approx. 1900 sq.m. (nearly one half acre) and comprising 2 Titles, the house is surrounded by attractive and productive gardens. The property is perfect as a permanent country residence, weekend retreat, rental investment or holiday getaway. Inspections by advance appointment only.
• 3 bedrooms – master bedroom with eastern aspect
• Bright open plan living-dining room with wood fire and split system
• Sunny kitchen with plenty of bench and storage space
• Central bathroom with shower, toilet
• Enclosed rear verandah with second toilet
• Mains power and town water connected
• Rewired, plumbed and stumped
• Plenty of sheds/workshops with concrete flooring plus potting shed, chook yard, old dairy and separator room
• Adjoins farmland to south and west
• Spectacular views over surrounding farmland to rolling hills
• Rich red soil with enormous ash tree and old weeping willow, orchard containing hazelnuts, mulberry tree, blood plum, apples, quince, apricot, cherry, fig, pomegranate and crab apple

Description:
Bluestone Stunner in a native bushland setting
**Price Reduction - now $390,000**
Stunning Country Lifestyle Awaits - 10 acres approx.
In the heartland of the Victorian Goldfields and located within close proximity and easy access to the popular Talbot (5 min), Avoca/Pyrenees District (25 min) and Ballarat (40 min) is this unique property in a serene setting.
Set on an attractive 10 acres surrounded mainly by native bushland reserve, this unique property features:
- Low maintenance 3br open plan Bluestone homestead (circa 1978) with bushland views from all aspects
- Extremely solid construction with Bluestone sourced from 1856 goldfields building
- Enormous central open fireplace, wonderful for entertaining and creates a stunning and cosy ambience.
- Cathedral style timber lined ceiling
- Reverse cycle air-conditioning
- Secure town water connected and weekly council rubbish collection
- Separate dining and kitchen
- Excellent WIFI/internet reception
- Well-appointed Bathroom and Laundry
- Established lawn and gardens, including Petanque pitch and outdoor fire pit
- Shed with concrete floor with two car carport
- Large dam perfect for recreational uses
With the local Talbot market held every month and the close proximity to the Pyrenees Wine region, this property is ideally situated and lends itself wonderfully to those who wish to experience a truly beautiful and tranquil property.
For inspection and further details please contact:
Adrian Smith
M: 0400 178 945
E: adrian.smith@landmark.com.au

Description:
RENOVATED HOME IN SOUGHT AFTER CRESWICK - BIG BLOCK
Located in the highly popular Creswick is the fully renovated family home. Internally there are 3 bedrooms, good sized living area with wood heater and split system, completely new kitchen with granite benchtop and s/steel appliances and also fully remodelled bathroom. Outside on the approx. 1700 sqm block enjoy the space for the kids or pets or perhaps look at a nice big shed. This property lends itself to the family wanting space to a great addition to you portfolio as a rental property in a location requiring more rentals.

Description:
LIVING THE DREAM! GOLDFIELDS RESORT CRESWICK
Lifestyle seeker plus interesting options. Awaken in one magnificent setting, amongst interesting, upmarket neighbouring properties. Stroll to native bushland or high standard golf course within a swing. Enjoy a latte on the sidewalks in trendy Creswick, Daylesford or many of the historic gold towns within striking distance. Easy access to Western Freeway and/or rail to Melbourne from Ballarat (10 minutes).
*3 Bedrooms, *3 Bathrooms, *3 Living areas including theatre rooms, *4 toilets, *Well laid out kitchen, *Gas log + 2 split systems. The Design - allows the home to be locked off allowing living in the front half & accommodation at the rear which provides its own Kitchenette and private access and parking. Feel on full-time holidays while enjoying the magnificent cove
